title: The Alphabet Song
story: Do you know the Alphabet song? The alphabet song? Yes. It's a song about the alphabet. How does it go, Michelle? It's easy, Sharon. Can you teach me? Yes. It's really pretty. I want to sing the alphabet song.
summary: Two friends discuss and learn the Alphabet song.
image: An illustration of two children sitting together, one holding a book with the alphabet letters on it.
